text: Agar jake az hamsaroni şumo ʙa sūji kofiron raft, on goh şumo [dar çang ʙar onon pirūz şuded va] ʙa intiqom az kofiron ʙarxosted, pas, ʙa kasone, ki hamsaronaşon [ʙa sūji kuffor] raftaand, hammonandi on ciro, ki xarç kardaand, [az ƣanoim] ʙipardozed; va az Allohe, ki şumo ʙa Ū imon dored, parvo kuned
